revised_title: On the Geometrical Representation of Thermo-Dynamic Engines and the Expansive Action of Heat
tldr: The author develops a geometrical representation of the expansive action of heat and the theory of thermo-dynamic engines, using diagrams of energy to demonstrate the general law of the economy of heat in thermodynamic engines. The study focuses on the transformation of heat to motive power through changes in the volume of an elastic substance, with applications to various types of engines.
